desc: Specialising in handmade sterling silver jewellery, memory jewellery, sea glass and more. We also offer a range of interactive jewellery making workshops, perfect for hen parties, birthdays and other celebrations alike.

layout.text: Change your gold jewellery into something completely bespoke. Whether it's an old family heirloom, or a piece that no longer fits - we can transform your gold into a beautiful, new treasure!
